thread.title: Discover The World Drives Sales For RentingCarz Holdings In 13 Latin American Countries
thread.title_full: Discover The World Drives Sales For RentingCarz Holdings In 13 Latin American Countries - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Discover The World Drives Sales For RentingCarz Holdings In 13 Latin American Countries
text:
Discover the World
SCOTTSDALE , Sept. 24, Discover the World, a leader in global travel distribution, has teamed with RentingCarz, holding company for AgentCars, the world's easiest online rental car platform, to be its sales agent in 13 Latin American countries-- Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Chile , Colombia , Costa Rica , El Salvador , Mexico , Panama , Paraguay , Peru , Uruguay and Venezuela .
"Working with Discover the World, we are poised to make great inroads in increasing car rental penetration throughout the region," said Grace Villamayor , CEO of RentingCarz. "We selected Discover's sales teams because they maintain excellent relationships with the local travel communities no matter in what country, and they will help to educate them about the simplicity of our booking process."
"It's the first time we have had the pleasure of representing the easiest and most powerful rental car platform in the marketplace to our travel partners in these 13 Latin American countries," said Jenny Adams , CEO of Discover the World. "We can guarantee RentingCarz will receive increased awareness and bookings on AgentCars as a result of this new relationship."
For more information about Discover the World, visit discovertheworld.com or call 480-707 5566 or +44 203 598 8030.
About Discover the World
Discover the World has earned a reputation as a leader in global travel distribution and its success in developing a worldwide network of 85 offices in more than 60 countries capable of exceptional representation performance is unmatched. With a portfolio of more than 90 clients utilizing its sales, marketing and business process outsourcing services, Discover the World remains a dominant innovator for the travel industry.
About RentingCarz
Founded in 2012 and based in Miami, Florida , RentingCarz Holdings was created by car rental experts with more than 50 years of experience, to simplify the car rental process and provide turnkey fully-integrated solutions for today's travel industry's needs. RentingCarz's patent-pending technology and unique business logic eliminates the need for any booking codes and with just three clicks, a car rental reservation is complete. RentingCarz showcases the best rates with 100 percent price transparency from the most reputable brands in the car rental industry. For more information, visit RentingCarz Holdings web sites for B2B at www.agentcars.com , for B2C www.rentingcarz.com or contact its world headquarters at 786.398.5223.
